name: Eira
languages: Druidic plus any two languages, Elvish

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
text: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put Eira to sleep.

trait.name: Mask of the Wild
text: <$title_short_name$> can attempt to hide even when they are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: Eira is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, produce flame, shillelagh
• 1st level (4 slots): entangle, longstrider, speak with animals, thunderwave

action.name: Quarterstaff
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh or if wielded with two hands.

spells: druidcraft, produce flame, shillelagh, entangle, longstrider, speak with animals, thunderwave, animal messenger, barkskin
